title: South Australian Roads
description: Some roads are missing or misnamed. See if you can help add this valuable information! Check out [https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Import/South_Australian_Roads](the import) on the wiki.
instruction: Check for a missing or misnamed road. If it is a simple typo, search google or http://maps.sa.gov.au/plb/ to check which dataset is more correct. If the data.sa.gov.au information is wrong, add a fixme note to the way; and contact the relevant council to confirm/have the data updated.
